Name: Geodatabase transactions
Description: This sample demonstrates how to manage edits to a local geodatabase inside of transactions.
Instructions: When the sample loads, a local geodatabase will be generated for a small area from the 'SaveTheBay' feature service. When the database is ready, load the geodatabase tables, then use the UI controls to make edits either inside or outside of a transaction. If made in a transaction, you can rollback or commit your edits as a single unit. To check the transaction status before attempting to start or end a transaction, check the 'Check transaction status' check box. If this box isn't checked, you will see the exception messages generated when making inappropriate transaction calls.
